source.sqlReaderQuery:
USE  [ADF_DB]
SELECT Quotename(table_schema) + '.'
       + Quotename(table_name) AS Table_Name,
       table_catalog
FROM   information_schema.tables
WHERE  table_type = 'BASE TABLE'

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	RunSeqNo as integer (-1)
}
source(output(
		Period as date,
		Product as string,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		Currency as string,
		{Units Sold} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> JolygoodSales
source(output(
		FromCurrency as string,
		ToCurrency as string,
		Date as date,
		ExchangeRate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LookupSource
JolygoodSales filter(Product != 'Month Total') ~> Removeagregaterowfromsourcedata
Removeagregaterowfromsourcedata, RatesToUSD lookup(Currency == ToCurrency
	&& Period == Date,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkupCurrency
LookupSource filter(FromCurrency == 'USD') ~> RatesToUSD
LkupCurrency derive(SalesValueUSD = {Unit Price}*{Units Sold}*ExchangeRate,
		Retailer = 'Joly Good Ltd',
		RunSeqNo = $RunSeqNo) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		RunSeqNo,
		Period,
		Product,
		SalesValueUSD,
		Retailer,
		UnitsSold = {Units Sold}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FinalDataSet
FinalDataSet sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		RowId as integer,
		Retailer as string,
		SalesMonth as date,
		Product as string,
		ManufacturerProductCode as string,
		SalesValueUSD as decimal(18,2),
		UnitsSold as integer,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		SourceFileName as string,
		RunSeqNo as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 3,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Retailer,
		SalesMonth = Period,
		Product,
		SalesValueUSD,
		UnitsSold,
		RunSeqNo
	)) ~> InsertInSqlTableSink

source(output(
		RowId as integer,
		Retailer as string,
		SalesMonth as date,
		Product as string,
		SalesValueUSD as decimal(19,2),
		UnitsSold as integer,
		RunSeqNo as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Product as string,
		ProductName as string,
		WeightInOunces as decimal(19,2),
		WeightInGrams as decimal(19,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 derive(ProductName = trim(left(Product, length(Product) - length(:WeightString))),
		WeightInOunces = toFloat(replace(:WeightString,:WeightUnit,'')) / iif(:WeightUnit == 'g', 28.945,1.0),
		WeightInGrams = toFloat(replace(:WeightString,:WeightUnit,'')) * iif(:WeightUnit == 'oz', 28.3495,1.0),
		WeightUnit = :WeightUnit,
		WeightString := right(Product, locate(' ', reverse(Product))-1),
		WeightUnit := iif(endsWith(Product, 'oz'),'oz','g'),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(Product),
	ProductName = first(ProductName),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Weight')), $$ = first($$))) ~> ProductAggregate
ProductAggregate, source2 exists(ProductAggregate@Product == source2@Product,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewRowsOnly
NewRowsOnly sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product as string,
		ProductName as string,
		WeightInOunces as decimal(19,2),
		WeightInGrams as decimal(19,2)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product,
		ProductName,
		WeightInOunces,
		WeightInGrams
	)) ~> FinalInsert

sources.name: Parquet1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Parquet1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Parquet1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://azstoragemk01.blob.core.windows.net/output/datalake/HandyCandy.parquet"),
  Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc)
in
  Parquet;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Parquet1,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"TransactionId", "StoreId"}),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns", "EndOfPreviousMonth", each Date.AddDays([TransactionDate], 1 -Date.Day([TransactionDate]))),
  #"Added custom 1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added custom", "SalesMonth", each Date.AddDays([EndOfPreviousMonth], 1)),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Added custom 1", {"TransactionDate", "EndOfPreviousMonth"}),
  #"Added custom 2" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns 1", "ItemCount", each 1),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Added custom 2", {"Product", "SalesMonth"}, {{"SalesValueUSD", each List.Sum([Price]), type nullable number}, {"UnitsSold", each List.Sum([ItemCount]), type any}}),
  #"Added custom 3" = Table.AddColumn(#"Grouped rows", "Retailer", each "Hand Candy")
in
  #"Added custom 3";

properties.description: This pipeline will use to execute other Pipeline
